name: Opening and Sill Acceptable, All elements approved as per drawings
Waterproofing (Check that water proofing is over area where airseal is going to be) PHOTO REQUIRED
Check the joinery if there is any damage
Install the Sub-frame perimeter into the position with approved fixing
All fixings oversealed on frame and no tooling damage on frame PHOTO REQUIRED
Ensure no packers visable out of line where airseal is to be installed.
Application of the Airseal Sealant w/ PE rod complete PHOTOS REQUIRED
Glazing rubber installed around frame and Unit. PHOTO REQUIRED
Install fixings and INTERNAL ANGLE to fixoff frames as per drawings PHOTO REQUIRED
Brick closer angle installed and sealed as per drawings PHOTO REQUIRED
Glass installed and no damaged glass
All elements completed correctly as per specification, reviewed and approved
